name: Clash of Vessels VR
description: Assume control of your fleet to confront your opponent. Pick and place your ships to deploy them on the battlefield. Seek and destroy your opponent's fleet before losing yours.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970, or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater. Storage: 1 GB available space
